description:
A badly wounded Yasaka is chained up inside the torture chamber. In order to protect Erika, he breaks free from his chains and uses his ultimate techinque against Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin Fist user Simeon. Their bloody battle is interrupted by Erika when she is enveloped by a blinding light and majestically 
speaks on Migadol`s Thunderbolts. Suddenly, the roof of Genesis` subterranean palace collapses, and Kasumi Kenshiro appears. "You smell even worse now." Kenshiro`s eyes are glittering with rage!!
Source: crunchyroll
